name: dandenney.com-11ty
description: This thing holds a series of words that I've spewed onto the internet since 2012. It's mainly so that I have a place to learn and play with front-end development, but also to keep my Google juice up against the guy with my name that created an airplane. Seriously, there's other Dan Denneys?

scripts.build: ELEVENTY_PRODUCTION=true rm -rf _site & eleventy --input=src --output=_site & NODE_ENV=production postcss src/styles/tailwind.css --o _site/styles/style.css
